oneLiner: When your pet goldfish becomes your worst nightmare
summary: In a world where household pets gain human-level intelligence, one family's goldfish develops an insatiable thirst for power. As it manipulates its owners and plots to take over the neighborhood, a young boy must find a way to outsmart the diabolical fish before it's too late.
name: Scales of Deception

oneLiner: Saving the world, one terrible joke at a time
summary: A group of failed stand-up comedians discover they possess the ability to repel alien invaders with their awful jokes. As Earth's last line of defense, they must hone their craft of terrible comedy while dealing with the ridicule of being the world's worst saviors.
name: Cosmic Punchline

oneLiner: Sexy Commando: Where martial arts meet absurdity in a high school comedy.
summary: In a high school club dedicated to an obscure and ridiculous martial art called 'Sexy Commando', a new student finds himself thrust into a world of bizarre techniques and outlandish challenges. The club's eccentric leader guides the protagonist and his fellow members through increasingly absurd situations, teaching them the ways of their unconventional fighting style. As they face off against rival clubs and deal with everyday school life, the group's antics escalate, leading to hilarious misunderstandings and chaotic confrontations that push the boundaries of common sense.

oneLiner: When flatulence becomes the unexpected hero of comedy.
summary: This quirky, short-form anime series takes an unconventional approach â€¦
